TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IServiceBehavior
public ref class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IServiceBehavior

summary.span: Aplicado a un servicio Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) para indicar si ese servicio se puede ejecutar en código de compatibilidad de ASP.NET.

span.span: Applied to a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service to indicate whether that service can be run in ASP.NET compatibility code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se aplica a una clase de implementación de servicio, este atributo indica si este servicio requiere o admite el modo de compatibilidad [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] que se va habilitar para el dominio de aplicación del hospedaje (AppDomain).When applied to a service implementation class, this attribute indicates whether this service requires or supports [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode to be enabled for the hosting application domain (AppDomain). Los servicios [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] de hospedaje AppDomain se pueden ejecutar en dos modos de hospedaje diferentes:AppDomains hosting [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services can run in two different hosting modes: - Modo de transporte mixto (Valor predeterminado): en este modo, los servicios [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] no participan en la canalización HTTP [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].Mixed Transports Mode (Default): In this mode, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services do not participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline. Esto garantiza que un servicio [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] se comporte de forma consistente, independientemente del entorno y del transporte de hospedaje.This guarantees that a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service behaves consistently, independent of hosting environment and transport. - Modo de compatibilidad de [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]: en este modo, los servicios de [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] participan en la canalización HTTP de [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] de una manera similar a los servicios ASMX.[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Compatibility Mode: In this mode, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline in a manner similar to ASMX services. Las características de [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] como Autorización de archivo, Autorización URL y Estado sesión HTTP son aplicables a los servicios de [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] que se ejecutan en este modo.[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] features such as File Authorization, UrlAuthorization, and HTTP Session State are applicable to [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services running in this mode. La marca de configuración en el nivel de la aplicación `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled` controla el modo de hospedaje.The hosting mode is controlled by the application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. `` `` `` Esta marca es `false` de forma predeterminada. De ese modo, los servicios [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] se ejecutan en el Modo de transporte mixto a menos que opte explícitamente por el modo de compatibilidad [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].This flag is `false` by default and thus [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services run in the Mixed Transports Mode unless you explicitly opt into the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode. Para obtener más información acerca del modo de compatibilidad ASP.NET, vea [ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md).For more informaiton about ASP.NET compatibility mode, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). Utilice la propiedad para hacerlo.Use the property to do this. En el tiempo de ejecución, las aplicaciones pueden detectar si el modo de compatibilidad [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] está habilitado comprobando el valor de la propiedad estática.At runtime, applications can detect if [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples Los desarrolladores de servicios pueden asegurarse de que su servicio sólo se ejecuta en modo de compatibilidad de ASP.NET estableciendo la propiedad en el a tal como se muestra en el ejemplo siguienteService developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the property on the to as shown in the following example [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode RequirementsMode { System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode value); };

summary.span: Obtiene o establece el nivel de compatibilidad [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] requerido por el servicio.

span.span: Gets or sets the level of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility required by the service.

value.span: que indica el grado requerido de compatibilidad [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] de los servicios.

span.span: The that indicates the services required degree of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Utilice la propiedad para establecer el modo de hospedaje en el código.Use the property to set the hosting mode in code. Esto también se puede hacer estableciendo una marca de configuración en el nivel de la aplicación `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`.This can also be done by setting an application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. Para obtener más información, consulte [ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md).For more information, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). En el tiempo de ejecución, las aplicaciones pueden detectar si el modo de compatibilidad [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] está habilitado comprobando el valor de la propiedad estática.At runtime, applications can detect whether [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método es compatible con la infraestructura de [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] y no está diseñado para utilizarse directamente desde el código.This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

summary.span: Comprueba que el tipo de hospedaje es coherente con los requisitos de compatibilidad [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].

span.span: Checks that the type of hosting is consistent with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.
